mapper.update:
update Franchiser
franchiseName = #{franchisename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
franchiseOrderNmuber = #{franchiseordernmuber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
franchisePhone = #{franchisephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

readState = #{readstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
formId = #{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where franchiserId = #{franchiserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Franchiser set franchiseName = #{franchisename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseOrderNmuber = #{franchiseordernmuber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchisePhone = #{franchisephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseApplyReason = #{franchiseapplyreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseConsumption = #{franchiseconsumption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openId = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseCreatTime = #{franchisecreattime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, franchiseState = #{franchisestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readState = #{readstate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where franchiserId = #{franchiserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select franchiserId, franchiseName, franchiseOrderNmuber, franchisePhone, franchiseApplyReason, franchiseConsumption, openId, franchiseCreatTime, franchiseState, readState, formId from Franchiser where franchiserId = #{franchiserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
